column2: "Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"You need Synthesizers each time you make an attribute upgrade, but it's worth the boost to the attribute value you'll get."
"Of course, there are limits to attribute values. With our current technology, it maxes out at 50, so that's what I want you to shoot for."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time back in the day, when I somehow managed to get a Synthesizer jammed in my..."
